name: Workspace Navigation
description: A component that allows users to switch between different workspaces they are a part of. It provides an overview of the existing workspaces and facilitates quick navigation between them.
location: Located at the top of the sidebar, often presented in a dropdown format or as a dedicated section for workspace selection.

sub.name: Workspace Selector
sub.description: Displays a dropdown or list for users to select between different workspaces they are signed into.
sub.location: Top of the Workspace Navigation component.
user_interactions: Switch workspace command sent on selection.

sub.name: Workspace Dropdown Button
sub.description: The button that activates the dropdown menu, allowing users to see and select available workspaces.
sub.location: Upper part of the Workspace Navigation section, often aligned to the left.

sub.name: Workspace List Item
sub.description: Individual items within the dropdown menu that represent each accessible workspace. Users can click to switch to a selected workspace.
sub.location: Within the dropdown menu of the Workspace Selector.

sub.name: Create Workspace Overlay
sub.description: Full-page overlay guiding the user through creating a new workspace, including name, details, and initial setup steps.
sub.location: Activated through the 'Create Workspace' button within the Workspace Navigation.
user_interactions: Wizard steps appear sequentially on submit.
New workspace data submitted on final step.

sub.name: Workspace Dropdown
sub.description: The entire dropdown component that appears when users click on the Workspace Dropdown Button, showing all available workspaces.
sub.location: Directly beneath the Workspace Dropdown Button.

sub.name: Dropdown Arrow Icon
sub.description: An icon indicating the presence of a dropdown menu, typically used to trigger the expansion of the Workspace Dropdown.
sub.location: Inside the Workspace Dropdown Button, aligned to the right.
user_interactions: Dropdown expands or collapses on click.

sub.name: Dropdown Workspace Toggle
sub.description: A toggle switch or button within the dropdown to easily switch between workspaces.
sub.location: Within the Workspace Dropdown, located at the top.

sub.name: Workspace Create Button
sub.description: A button that, when clicked, initiates the process to create a new workspace.
sub.location: Located at the bottom or within the Footer of the Workspace Dropdown.
user_interactions: Create Workspace Overlay appears on click.

sub.name: Dropdown Close Button
sub.description: Button or clickable area that allows users to close the dropdown manually.
sub.location: At the top right corner of the Workspace Dropdown.

sub.name: Workspace Details Display
sub.description: Shows additional details about the workspace such as the user's role or recent activity within the dropdown.
sub.location: Displayed adjacent to workspace names within the Workspace List in the dropdown.
user_interactions: Expandable or collapsible on click to show more/less details.

sub.name: Create Workspace Wizard
sub.description: The step-by-step interface that guides the user through the process of creating a new workspace.
sub.location: Overlay covers the main section of the screen when activated.
user_interactions: Next step appears on button click.
Workspace data submission on final submit.

sub.name: Dropdown Item Icon
sub.description: An icon associated with each item in the dropdown, usually providing a visual clue about the workspace or its status (e.g., active, inactive).
sub.location: Adjacent to each list item within the Workspace Dropdown.

sub.name: Dropdown (Workspace) Search Box
sub.description: Enables users to search for specific workspaces within the dropdown quickly.
sub.location: Located at the top of the Workspace Dropdown, facilitating easy access.
user_interactions: Filters dropdown list as user types.

sub.name: Workspace Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip that provides additional information or descriptions about the workspace when hovered over with the cursor.
sub.location: Appears near the Dropdown Item Icon or workspace name when hovered.

sub.name: Icon Tooltip
sub.description: A small popup providing additional context or details about the icon's function when hovered over.
sub.location: Displays next to or above the Dropdown Item Icon when mouse hover is detected.
user_interactions: Appears on hover over the icon.

sub.name: Search Bar Placeholder Text
sub.description: Provides a visual cue within the search bar to indicate it's for searching workspaces.
sub.location: Inside the search input area of the Dropdown (Workspace) Search Box.
user_interactions: Text disappears on focus or input.

sub.name: Tooltip Dismiss Overlay
sub.description: An overlay that facilitates closing the workspace tooltip when clicked outside the tooltip area.
sub.location: Covers the screen excluding the tooltip, active when a tooltip is displayed.
user_interactions: Does not interfere with other components when tooltip is absent.

sub.name: Divider Line Style
sub.description: Defines the visual attributes (color, thickness) of divider lines in dropdowns to enhance component separation.
sub.location: Applies to all visible divider lines within the Dropdown Divider component.

sub.name: Quick Action Confirmation Dialog
sub.description: A dialog box confirming the user's action when a quick action is initiated, preventing accidental modifications.
sub.location: Centered on screen, appearing over all other content when a quick action in the dropdown is clicked.
user_interactions: Confirms on approve, cancels on decline.

sub.name: Dropdown Search Icon
sub.description: An icon within the search bar that indicates the search function, usually represented as a magnifying glass.
sub.location: Inside the Dropdown (Workspace) Search Box, aligned to the left or right side.
user_interactions: No direct interaction, serves as a visual cue.

sub.name: Tooltip Close Button
sub.description: A button in the tooltip that allows users to manually close the tooltip.
sub.location: Inside the Workspace Tooltip or Icon Tooltip component.

sub.name: Divider Color Scheme
sub.description: Sets the color theme and styling of divider lines to match the application's visual identity.
sub.location: Applied to all divider lines within the Dropdown Divider component.

sub.name: Action Confirmation Button Set
sub.description: A set of buttons (e.g., confirm, cancel) within the Quick Action Confirmation Dialog, allowing users to complete or discard their action.
sub.location: Inside the Quick Action Confirmation Dialog component.

sub.name: Dropdown Item Background
sub.description: Visual background component for each dropdown item, providing hover and active state changes.
sub.location: Behind each Dropdown Workspace Toggle and Dropdown Item Icon components.

sub.name: Dropdown Divider
sub.description: A visual line or space that separates different sections of items within the dropdown for better organization.
sub.location: Divides sections within the Workspace Dropdown.

sub.name: Dropdown Quick Action Button
sub.description: Buttons that offer quick actions related to the workspace, such as pinning a workspace or accessing frequently used settings.
sub.location: Within each list item or as part of a header in the Workspace Dropdown.
user_interactions: Opens respective action or menu on click.

sub.name: Workspace Name Display
sub.description: Text showing the name of the current workspace to which the user is logged in, acting as a label for the Workspace Navigation component.
sub.location: Horizontally aligned within the Workspace Navigation, next to the current workspace banner.

sub.name: Settings Menu
sub.description: A menu appearing upon activating the Workspace Settings Icon, offering settings options such as notifications and integrations.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Workspace Settings Icon when clicked.

sub.name: Search Box Outline
sub.description: A visual border around the search bar to delineate the input field clearly and provide focus indication.
sub.location: Encapsulates the Dropdown (Workspace) Search Box component.

sub.name: Close Button Icon
sub.description: An illustrative icon inside the Tooltip Close Button to indicate its purpose clearly, typically represented by an 'X'.
sub.location: Centered within each Tooltip Close Button.

sub.name: Button Background Style
sub.description: Defines the visual style or theme (color, shadow) applied to buttons within Action Confirmation Button Set.
sub.location: Behind each button in the Action Confirmation Button Set.

sub.name: Hover Shade Overlay
sub.description: A subtle shade that appears over dropdown items to indicate an active hover state, enhancing interactivity feedback.
sub.location: Covers the Dropdown Item Background component during mouse hover.

sub.name: Placeholder Fade Animation
sub.description: An animation sequence for the disappearance of placeholder text, providing a smooth user experience.
sub.location: Within the Search Bar Placeholder Text component.

sub.name: New Workspace Notification
sub.description: Notification element indicating successful creation of a new workspace or any issues encountered.
sub.location: Heads-up notification area, typically at the top or bottom of the screen.

sub.name: Workspace Settings Icon
sub.description: Icon or button that users click to access their workspace settings menu.
sub.location: Typically located near the Workspace Dropdown button.
user_interactions: Available as a gear or menu icon.

sub.name: Current Workspace Banner
sub.description: A small banner or title indicating the currently active workspace, helping users keep track of their current context.
sub.location: Integrated within or around the Workspace Dropdown Button, ensuring visibility.

sub.name: Create Workspace Button
sub.description: Allows users to create a new workspace, guiding them through a setup wizard.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Workspace Selector, often presented as a plus icon or button.

sub.name: Workspace List
sub.description: Lists all the workspaces available to the user for selection.
sub.location: Part of the overlay or dropdown from the Workspace Selector.
user_interactions: Workspace list item focus changes on hover.

sub.name: Workspace Settings
sub.description: Provides access to settings related to the workspace, such as notifications, integrations, and members.
sub.location: Accessible via a settings icon or menu within the Workspace Navigation or dropdown.

sub.name: Current Workspace Indicator
sub.description: Visually indicates which workspace is currently active.
sub.location: Integrated within the Workspace Selector.

name: Channel List
description: Displays a list of all channels the user has access to within a selected workspace. This includes public channels, private channels, and any group chats.
location: Typically situated on the left sidebar of the main page interface, providing easy navigation to engage in various channels.

sub.name: Channel Header
sub.description: Displays the name and important information about a channel, such as its purpose and description.
sub.location: Topmost section of each channel within the Channel List.
user_interactions: Settings or channel options are accessible from here.

sub.name: Channel Header Title
sub.description: The main title of the channel in the header section, showing the channel name prominently.
sub.location: Within the Channel Header component, at the center or left alignment.

sub.name: Channel Header Icons
sub.description: A set of icons for quick actions or information, such as notifications, settings, or members.
sub.location: Inside the Channel Header, typically aligned to the right.
user_interactions: Open respective settings or views on click.

sub.name: Channel Details Tooltip
sub.description: A tooltip providing more information about the channel when hovering over its name or icon.
sub.location: Appears next to the Channel Name or Channel Icon when hovered.

sub.name: Channel Header Action Button
sub.description: Button within the Channel Header to join or leave a channel quickly.
sub.location: Aligned within the Channel Header Icons on the right side.

sub.name: Unread Message Counter
sub.description: Numerical display indicating the number of unread messages in a channel.
sub.location: Overlaid on the Unread Messages Indicator component.
user_interactions: Counter resets to zero on channel open.

sub.name: Channel Settings Modal
sub.description: A modal overlay providing channel-specific settings when accessing settings from the Channel Settings Gear.
sub.location: Covers main content when accessed, appearing centered on screen.
user_interactions: Settings adjustments are applied on save.
Modal closes on outside click or cancel.

sub.name: Channel List Sorting Button
sub.description: Button to toggle or configure sorting options for channels, such as by frequency of use or alphabetically.
sub.location: Above the Channel List, near the top of the component.
user_interactions: Opens sorting options menu on click.

sub.name: Starred Channel Indicator
sub.description: Visual indicator showing which channels are marked as 'starred' by the user for easy access.
sub.location: Next to the Channel Name for starred channels in the Channel List.

sub.name: Channel Pin Icon
sub.description: Icon indicating that a channel is pinned to stay at the top of the list for quick access.
sub.location: To the left or right of the Channel Name for pinned channels.

sub.name: Channel Collapse/Expand Button
sub.description: Button to collapse or expand groups of channels, such as direct messages or shared workspaces.
sub.location: Alongside group headers within the Channel List.
user_interactions: Toggles between collapse and expand states on click.

sub.name: Channel List Background
sub.description: Background design of the channel list, providing visual structure and separation.
sub.location: Envelopes the entire list, setting the visual boundary.

sub.name: Add Channel Overlay
sub.description: Overlay that allows users to quickly join or add channels they have access to but haven't joined yet.
sub.location: Accessible via an option within the Channel List or header.
user_interactions: Appears on click of 'Add Channel' option.
Adds selected channel to list on confirmation.

sub.name: Sorting Options Menu
sub.description: Dropdown or modal providing options for users to select their preferred channel sorting order.
sub.location: Activated from the Channel List Sorting Button, appearing below or near the button.
user_interactions: Sorting preferences are applied on selection.

sub.name: Star Selection Overlay
sub.description: Interactive overlay allowing users to choose or modify their starred channels.
sub.location: Accessed through the Starred Channel Indicator, hovering over the selected channel name.

sub.name: Sorting Arrow Icon
sub.description: An icon indicating the direction of the sorting order, appearing within the Sorting Options Menu or alongside the sorting button.
sub.location: Part of the Sorting Options Menu, adjacent to selected sorting options.
user_interactions: Updates direction on sorting preference change.

sub.name: Star Toggle Animation
sub.description: Animation providing visual feedback when toggling the starred status of a channel.
sub.location: Within the Star Selection Overlay or when toggling from the Starred Channel Indicator.

sub.name: Pin Status Reminder
sub.description: Small notification or tooltip reminding users of the pin status of a channel or offering to pin a frequently used channel.
sub.location: Below or near the Channel Pin Icon.
user_interactions: Displays on hover or pin action.

sub.name: Collapse Animation Overlay
sub.description: Layer enhancing the collapse/expand animation with shadow effects, making transitions smoother and more visually appealing.
sub.location: Applied during animations initiated by the Channel Collapse/Expand Button.

sub.name: Add Channel Loader
sub.description: Visual indicator or spinner showing loading status when a channel is being added.
sub.location: Within the Add Channel Confirmation Dialog until the channel successfully appears in the list.

sub.name: Pin Confirmation Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip confirming a channel has been pinned or providing pinning instructions.
sub.location: Appears over the Channel Pin Icon when engaged by interaction.

sub.name: Collapse Toggle Animation
sub.description: Animation enhancing the visual feedback when collapsing or expanding channel groups in the list.
sub.location: Within the Channel Collapse/Expand Button component.

sub.name: Add Channel Confirmation Dialog
sub.description: Dialog prompting user confirmation when adding a new channel to their Channel List.
sub.location: Activated from the Add Channel Overlay, appearing in a central screen area.

sub.name: Create Channel Form Field
sub.description: Input field within the Create Channel Wizard allowing users to enter the channel name and other initial details.
sub.location: Within the Create Channel Wizard component.
user_interactions: Validates input on form step completion.
Displays error message for invalid input.

sub.name: Channel List Section Divider
sub.description: Visual divider separating different groups of channels, such as starred or regularly used.
sub.location: Between channel groupings within the Channel List.

sub.name: Channel Header Divider
sub.description: Visual divider below the channel header to separate it from the list of messages or content within the channel.
sub.location: Directly beneath the Channel Header section.

sub.name: Channel Notification Icon
sub.description: Icon indicating the type of notifications enabled for the channel (all, mentions only, etc.).
sub.location: Next to the Channel Name within the Channel Notification Settings.

sub.name: Channel Settings Gear
sub.description: A small gear icon that provides quick access to the channel's settings page when clicked.
sub.location: Located within the Channel Notification Settings or alongside Channel Header Icons.
user_interactions: Settings panel or overlay appears on click.

sub.name: Create Channel Wizard
sub.description: An interactive overlay or modal guiding users through the steps of creating a new channel, including name, members, and permissions.
sub.location: Launched from the Create Channel Button.
user_interactions: Progresses through wizard steps on continue click.
New channel is created on final confirmation.

sub.name: Sorting Indicator Icon
sub.description: Visual representation of the sorting criteria currently applied to the channel list.
sub.location: Next to the Channel List Sorting Button at the top of the Channel List.
user_interactions: Changes based on selected sorting option.

sub.name: Star Visual Feedback Animation
sub.description: Animation effect that provides user feedback when a channel's starred status is toggled.
sub.location: Engages within the Starred Channel Indicator section next to a channel name.
user_interactions: Plays when a channel is starred or unstarred.

sub.name: Pin Interaction Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip that displays guidance or confirmation when a channel is pinned or unpinned.
sub.location: Anchored next to the Channel Pin Icon.

sub.name: Group Collapse Animation
sub.description: Animation sequence for visually transitioning channel group states between expanded and collapsed.
sub.location: Triggers within the Channel Collapse/Expand Button actions.

sub.name: Loading Spinner for Channel Addition
sub.description: Spinner indicating the process is underway for adding a channel to the user's list.
sub.location: Displays in the Add Channel Confirmation Dialog after confirming addition.

sub.name: Channel Name
sub.description: Clickable text representing the name of a channel, used for identifying and navigating to a channel.
sub.location: Within each entry in the Channel List section.
user_interactions: Can be edited in channel settings.

sub.name: Channel Icon
sub.description: An icon adjacent to the channel name which provides a visually distinct indicator for different channel types (public, private, etc.).
sub.location: Left of the Channel Name in each channel entry.
user_interactions: Tooltip with channel info on hover.

sub.name: Unread Messages Indicator
sub.description: Displays a badge or highlight to indicate unread messages in the channel.
sub.location: Overlaying or next to the Channel Name for channels with unseen messages.

sub.name: Channel Notification Settings
sub.description: Settings option to adjust notification preferences for a particular channel.
sub.location: Accessible from each channel entry in the Channel List or from the Channel Header.

sub.name: Channel List Header
sub.description: The header area of the channel list, typically including sorting buttons and indicators for starred or pinned channels.
sub.location: At the top of the Channel List component, above the list of individual channels.
user_interactions: Opens sorting options on button click.

sub.name: Header Sorting Controls
sub.description: Controls for sorting channels in different orders like A-Z or based on activity.
sub.location: Located at the top of the Channel List Header.

sub.name: Channel Entry Name
sub.description: Displays the name of the channel for identification within the entry.
sub.location: Central part of the Channel Entry, prominently displayed.

sub.name: Channel Entry Notification Icon
sub.description: Icon indicating if there are any notifications or unread messages in the channel.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Channel Entry Name.

sub.name: Starred Channel List
sub.description: A section for listing channels that are marked as starred by the user.
sub.location: Within the Starred Channel Section, typically at the beginning of Channel List.
user_interactions: Starred status is toggled on icon click.

sub.name: Channel Group Header
sub.description: Title or label for a group of channels, distinguishing separate sections in the list.
sub.location: Above the grouped channels within the Channel List.
user_interactions: Collapse or expand the group on click.

sub.name: Overlay New Channel Creation
sub.description: Interface allowing users to input details and initiate a new channel creation.
sub.location: Appears centrally on the interface when called from the Channel Creation Overlay.

sub.name: Channel Naming Field
sub.description: Input field for the channel name, which lets users specify the name of the new channel they are creating.
sub.location: Inside the Overlay New Channel Creation section.

sub.name: Header Sorting Arrow
sub.description: Arrow icon indicating the direction (ascending or descending) of the current sorting order.
sub.location: Next to the Header Sorting Controls in the Channel List Header.
user_interactions: Updates direction based on selected sorting.

sub.name: Notification Badge
sub.description: Badge displaying the number of unread messages in the Channel Entry Notification Icon.
sub.location: Overlaying the Channel Entry Notification Icon component.
user_interactions: Resets count when entering the channel.

sub.name: Star Toggle Animation Effect
sub.description: Animated transition used when a channel's starred status is toggled on or off.
sub.location: Triggered from the Starred Channel List section.

sub.name: Group Header Toggle Button
sub.description: Button within the Channel Group Header allowing collapsing and expanding actions for channel groups.
sub.location: Next to the title in Channel Group Header section.

sub.name: Channel Creation Confirmation Button
sub.description: Button that initiates the confirmation for creating a new channel, submitting the user inputs.
sub.location: In the Overlay New Channel Creation form.

sub.name: Channel Entry
sub.description: Individual entry within the channel list, representing a specific channel with its name and status indicators.
sub.location: Within the main body of the Channel List component.

sub.name: Sorting Selection Panel
sub.description: Panel for selecting sorting options for the channels list, such as alphabetical or by activity.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Header Sorting Controls in the Channel List Header.
user_interactions: Opens on interaction with Header Sorting Controls.

sub.name: Channel Description Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip displaying a brief description or topic of the channel on hover over the Channel Entry Name.
sub.location: Appears near the Channel Entry Name

sub.name: Notification Icon Pulse Animation
sub.description: Animation effect for the notification icon to draw attention to unread messages.
sub.location: Around the Channel Entry Notification Icon.
user_interactions: Repeats at intervals until interacted with.

sub.name: Star Entry Animation
sub.description: Visual animation effect applied to a channel entry upon being 'starred' by the user.
sub.location: Initiates within the Starred Channel List when a channel is starred.

sub.name: Group Header Collapse Animation
sub.description: Animation providing visual transition during toggling of expanded/collapsed group states.
sub.location: Within the Group Header Toggle Button actions.

sub.name: Channel Creation Input Validator
sub.description: Functionality within Overlay New Channel Creation ensuring input fields meet standard requirements.
sub.location: Embedded within the Overlay New Channel Creation form inputs.
user_interactions: Validates inputs in real-time on typing.

sub.name: Channel Group Divider
sub.description: Dividers that separate different groups of channels, such as those for different projects or purposes.
sub.location: Between groups of channels within the list.

sub.name: Channel List Scrollbar
sub.description: Scrollbar allowing users to navigate through a long list of channels.
sub.location: On the edge of the Channel List component, typically the right side.
user_interactions: Scrolls the list on drag or arrow clicks.

sub.name: Starred Channel Section
sub.description: Specific section within the Channel List dedicated to channels marked as starred by the user.
sub.location: Within the Channel List, typically at the top for easy access.
user_interactions: Toggle star status on icon click.

sub.name: Sorting Control Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown menu that provides different sorting options for channel organization.
sub.location: Appears below Header Sorting Controls in the Channel List Header.

sub.name: Tooltip Content Display
sub.description: Area within the tooltip that shows dynamic content such as channel descriptions.
sub.location: Inside the Channel Description Tooltip

sub.name: Notification Pulse Effect
sub.description: Visual effect indicating unread messages, adding emphasis via a pulsing animation.
sub.location: Overlays the Notification Icon Pulse Animation.

sub.name: Star Animation Sequencing
sub.description: The sequence of visual effects applied during the starring transition.
sub.location: Within the Star Entry Animation.

sub.name: Group Expansion Transition
sub.description: Smooth transition effect for expanding a group of channels in the list.
sub.location: Handled by Group Header Collapse Animation.

sub.name: Validator Error Display
sub.description: Displays error messages related to invalid input within the Channel Creation Input Validator.
sub.location: Below the Channel Creation Input Fields within Overlay New Channel Creation.

sub.name: Channel Creation Overlay
sub.description: Overlay that prompts and guides users through creating a new channel.
sub.location: Accessed from the Create Channel Button and appears as an overlay on top of the channel list.
user_interactions: New channel is created on submit.

sub.name: Dropdown Sorting Interaction Zone
sub.description: Interactive area that engages sorting dropdown actions within the Channel List Header.
sub.location: Located directly below the Sorting Control Dropdown.

sub.name: Tooltip Display Mechanism
sub.description: Core functionality facilitating the display of dynamic tooltip content.
sub.location: Embedded within the Tooltip Content Display.

sub.name: Pulse Animation Trigger
sub.description: Event mechanism that initiates pulse animation to notify unread messages.
sub.location: Triggered from the Notification Pulse Effect.

sub.name: Animation Effect Timing
sub.description: Coordinates the timing and sequence of animations in the Star Animation Sequencing.
sub.location: Within Star Entry Animation processes.
user_interactions: Ensures smooth animation during star toggle.

sub.name: Expansion Animation Dynamics
sub.description: Manages the physical properties of group expansion, like duration and easing.
sub.location: Applies within Group Expansion Transition.

sub.name: Error Messaging Display Zone
sub.description: Designated area for presenting input validation errors visibly.
sub.location: Part of Validator Error Display within Overlay New Channel Creation.
user_interactions: Shown in response to invalid inputs.

sub.name: Create Channel Button
sub.description: Button to initiate creation of a new channel, leading to a setup wizard.
sub.location: Usually at the top or bottom of the Channel List component.
user_interactions: New Channel overlay appears on click.

name: Direct Messages List
description: Shows a list of ongoing direct message conversations with other users. This is crucial for one-on-one communication outside of channels.
location: Located under the channel list on the left sidebar of the main interface.

sub.name: DM List Header
sub.description: The top section of the direct messages list, providing options for sorting and managing direct message interactions.
sub.location: At the top of the Direct Messages List component.

sub.name: DM Header Sorting Controls
sub.description: Controls for sorting DMs in different orders such as by latest or frequently contacted.
sub.location: Located within the DM List Header.

sub.name: Direct Message User Avatar
sub.description: User avatar representing the contact in a DM entry, providing visual identification.
sub.location: Integrated within the DM Entry, adjacent to the contact name.
user_interactions: Enlarges or shows details tooltip on hover.

sub.name: DM Starred Indicator
sub.description: Indicates whether a DM is marked as starred for quick access.
sub.location: Next to the name in each DM Entry.

sub.name: DM Notification Icon
sub.description: Icon indicating unread messages or notifications within a DM Entry.
sub.location: Overlaying the DM Entry, typically on the right side.

sub.name: New DM Overlay
sub.description: Overlay that provides an interface for selecting users and starting a new DM.
sub.location: Activated from the New DM Button.

sub.name: DM Sorting Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown menu providing options to sort the DM list by criteria such as latest activity or alphabetical order.
sub.location: Located within the DM Header Sorting Controls.
user_interactions: Opens on interaction with sorting controls.

sub.name: User Avatar Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip that appears with additional user information when hovering over a DM user avatar.
sub.location: Displayed upon hover over the Direct Message User Avatar.

sub.name: Starred DM Indicator
sub.description: Animation applied when a DM's starred status is toggled, indicating current state.
sub.location: Within the DM Starred Indicator in the DM Entry.

sub.name: DM Notification Animation
sub.description: Animation applied to highlight unread DM notifications visually.
sub.location: Surrounding the DM Notification Icon.
user_interactions: Plays in a loop until message is read.

sub.name: User Selection Modal
sub.description: Modal interface allowing the selection of users to start a new DM conversation.
sub.location: Launched from the New DM Overlay.

sub.name: DM Sorting Dropdown Toggle
sub.description: Toggle function for displaying or hiding the sorting dropdown menu in the DM list.
sub.location: Part of the DM Sorting Dropdown at the top of the list.
user_interactions: Opens and closes dropdown on click.

sub.name: Avatar Info Tooltip
sub.description: Provides detailed user information within a tooltip, expanded when hovering over the User Avatar.
sub.location: Shown above or next to the Direct Message User Avatar on hover.

sub.name: Star Toggle State Animation
sub.description: Visual effect indicating a toggled star status change in a DM entry.
sub.location: Within the Starred DM Indicator on each DM Entry.

sub.name: Notification Alert Highlight
sub.description: Highlight effect drawing attention to new notifications or unread messages.
sub.location: Surrounds the DM Notification Animation in each DM Entry.

sub.name: Participant Selection Overlay
sub.description: Overlay feature for choosing participants when initializing a new direct message.
sub.location: Operated through the User Selection Modal from the New DM Overlay.

sub.name: DM Dropdown Toggle Icon
sub.description: Icon to toggle the visibility of the DM Sorting Dropdown for choosing sorting preferences.
sub.location: Within the DM Sorting Dropdown Toggle area.

sub.name: Avatar Detail Expansion
sub.description: Expansion feature for the Avatar Info Tooltip to enrich user information on hover.
sub.location: Part of the Avatar Info Tooltip.

sub.name: Starred Status Visual Cue
sub.description: Cue that visually confirms a DM entry is starred or unstarred.
sub.location: Embedded in the Star Toggle State Animation of the DM Entry.

sub.name: Notification Intensity Pulse
sub.description: Pulse effect indicates the urgency or intensity of new notifications.
sub.location: Inside the Notification Alert Highlight section within DM Entry.

sub.name: User Selection Grid
sub.description: Grid layout within the Participant Selection Overlay facilitating the user selection process.
sub.location: Engaged through the Participant Selection Overlay.

sub.name: Sorting Icon Indicator
sub.description: Icon indicating current sorting criteria within the DM list, such as alphabetical order.
sub.location: Located within the DM Sorting Dropdown Toggle.
user_interactions: Updates based on chosen sorting option.

sub.name: User Profile Tooltip Extension
sub.description: Extends user profile data, showing additional user information in the tooltip on DM avatar hover.
sub.location: Part of the Avatar Detail Expansion areas.

sub.name: Visual Feedback for Star Toggle
sub.description: Feedback animation speaking to a change in the star status for better visual comprehension.
sub.location: Within the Starred Status Visual Cue in each DM Entry.

sub.name: Highlight Urgency Pulse
sub.description: Pulse animation that draws attention to urgent message notifications through rhythmic intensity.
sub.location: Embedded within the Notification Intensity Pulse in DM Entry.
user_interactions: Replays until user sees the message.

sub.name: Grid User Selection Interface
sub.description: Grid interface used in the User Selection Grid to select multiple users for DM initiation.
sub.location: Utilized within the Participant Selection Overlay.

sub.name: Reset Mechanism for Unread Badge
sub.description: Automated logic resetting the unread badge count once the user opens a direct message.
sub.location: Embedded into the Unread Badge Reset Mechanism section.
user_interactions: Automatically resets count on message access.

sub.name: Unread Badge Reset Mechanism
sub.description: Mechanism that resets unread message counts once a DM entry is accessed by the user.
sub.location: Attached to the Unread Badge Display within each DM Entry.
user_interactions: Resets unread badge on DM open.

sub.name: Unread Badge Display
sub.description: Displays the number of new messages configured as an overlay badge in DM entries.
sub.location: Located over the Unread DM Count Badge in the DM Entry.

sub.name: Unread DM Count Badge
sub.description: A badge indicator showing the number of unread messages in a DM Entry.
sub.location: Overlaying the DM Notification Count area.
user_interactions: Resets to zero when DM is accessed.

sub.name: DM Notification Count
sub.description: Badge displaying the number of unread messages or notifications for a DM Entry.
sub.location: Overlaying the DM Notification Icon.
user_interactions: Resets counter when DM is opened.

sub.name: DM Entry
sub.description: Individual entry within the direct messages list, representing a conversation with another user or group.
sub.location: Within the main body of the Direct Messages List component.
user_interactions: Opens DM conversation on name click.
Displays tooltip on user avatar hover.

sub.name: Sorting Icon Rotation
sub.description: Animated rotation effect when the sorting criteria is changed visually.
sub.location: Within the Sorting Icon Indicator of the DM Sorting Dropdown.
user_interactions: Rotates to show change in sorting criteria.

sub.name: Profile Tooltip Expansion
sub.description: Animation for expanding the profile tooltip displaying user data on hover.
sub.location: Contained within the User Profile Tooltip Extension.

sub.name: Star Visual Feedback Animation
sub.description: Visual feedback via animation to confirm toggling of star status in DM entries.
sub.location: Part of the Visual Feedback for Star Toggle feature.

sub.name: Urgency Pulse Animation Style
sub.description: Styling and pacing for the pulse effect indicating urgent notifications.
sub.location: Managed within the Highlight Urgency Pulse section.

sub.name: Selection Grid Mechanics
sub.description: Underlying mechanics for smoothly operating the user selection grid interface.
sub.location: Implemented within the Grid User Selection Interface area.

sub.name: Reset Logic Execution
sub.description: Runs logic for resetting unread message badges when a user engages a DM.
sub.location: Executed by the Reset Mechanism for Unread Badge.
user_interactions: Executes reset process on DM access.

sub.name: DM Group Header
sub.description: Organizes and labels groups of DMs within the list, such as unread or starred messages.
sub.location: Between groups of DMs within the list.

sub.name: DM List Scrollbar
sub.description: Scrollbar allowing users to navigate through a long list of direct messages.
sub.location: On the edge of the Direct Messages List component, typically the right side.
user_interactions: Scrolls the list on drag or arrow clicks.

sub.name: New DM Button
sub.description: A button for starting a new direct message conversation by selecting one or multiple users.
sub.location: Typically found at the top or bottom of the Direct Messages List.
user_interactions: Opens a new DM overlay for creating conversations.

sub.name: DM Notification Badge
sub.description: Displays a badge indicating unread messages for each DM entry within the list.
sub.location: Overlaying the DM Entry within the Direct Messages List.
user_interactions: Badge disappears when DM is opened.

name: Message Input Box
description: A text input area where users can type their messages, upload files, and send emojis. It is a primary interaction point for sending messages.
location: Found at the bottom of the main chat area for the active channel or direct message.

sub.name: Text Input Area
sub.description: The main area where users type their messages before sending.
sub.location: Central section of the Message Input Box.
user_interactions: Message sent on Enter key pressed.

sub.name: File Upload Button
sub.description: Button that allows users to upload files to a conversation.
sub.location: Typically positioned to the left or right of the Text Input Area.
user_interactions: File selection dialog opened on click.

sub.name: Emoji Picker
sub.description: A feature that allows users to browse and insert emojis into messages.
sub.location: Activated from a button near the Text Input Area.
user_interactions: Opens emoji selection menu on click.
Emoji inserted into message on selection.

sub.name: Text Input Placeholder
sub.description: Placeholder text within the Text Input Area that guides users on what to type.
sub.location: Inside the Text Input Area when empty.
user_interactions: Reappears when input area is cleared.

sub.name: File Upload Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip providing additional information or instructions for the File Upload Button.
sub.location: Appears when hovering over the File Upload Button.

sub.name: Emoji Search Bar
sub.description: Search bar within the Emoji Picker allowing users to quickly find specific emojis.
sub.location: Top section of the Emoji Picker interface.
user_interactions: Filters emojis as text is entered.

sub.name: Formatting Option Button
sub.description: Individual buttons within the Formatting Toolbar for selecting text formatting options.
sub.location: Across the Formatting Toolbar.
user_interactions: Applies formatting to selected text on click.

sub.name: Send Button Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip providing sending instructions or shortcuts related to the Send Button.
sub.location: Appears when hovering over the Send Button.

sub.name: Autocomplete Suggestion
sub.description: Dynamic dropdown suggesting usernames or channel names while typing mentions.
sub.location: Below the text cursor within the Mentions Autocomplete feature.

sub.name: Input Placeholder Animation
sub.description: Animation guiding the appearance and disappearance of placeholder text within the Text Input Area.
sub.location: Within the Text Input Placeholder in the Text Input Area.

sub.name: Tooltip Appearance Effect
sub.description: Visual effect managing the showing and hiding of tooltips throughout the Message Input Box.
sub.location: Used within elements like File Upload Tooltip and Send Button Tooltip.

sub.name: Emoji Search Filter
sub.description: Filter mechanism to refine emoji search results in real-time as users type.
sub.location: Operational within the Emoji Search Bar in the Emoji Picker.
user_interactions: Filters emojis as keywords are typed.

sub.name: Format Toggle Button
sub.description: Toggle buttons within the Formatting Option Button set for activating and deactivating text formatting.
sub.location: Within the Formatting Option Button section.

sub.name: Send Confirmation Feedback
sub.description: Feedback indicating a message has been queued or sent successfully when using the Send Button.
sub.location: Triggered by interactions with the Send Button.

sub.name: Mention Suggestion Selection
sub.description: Mechanism for selecting from autocomplete suggestions during mention typing.
sub.location: Operating within the Autocomplete Suggestion feature.
user_interactions: Selection via arrow keys and enter.

sub.name: Placeholder Fade Animation
sub.description: Animation that smooths the transition of the placeholder text in and out of view.
sub.location: Within the Input Placeholder Animation of the Text Input Area.

sub.name: Tooltip Display Timing
sub.description: Controls the timing and duration for the appearance of tooltips when hovering over various elements.
sub.location: Used in Tooltip Appearance Effect across tooltips like for File Upload and Send Button.

sub.name: Emoji Search Result Filter
sub.description: Filters the search results for emojis based on user input in real time.
sub.location: Operational within the Emoji Search Filter.
user_interactions: Updates results as text is entered.

sub.name: Format Button Interaction
sub.description: Handles interactions with the Format Toggle Button, including activation and deactivation of formatting.
sub.location: Within the Format Toggle Button in the Formatting Option Button section.

sub.name: Send Status Indicator
sub.description: Shows an indicator to confirm the successful sending of a message.
sub.location: Part of the Send Confirmation Feedback for the Send Button.

sub.name: Suggestion Selection Interaction
sub.description: Interactivity feature allowing users to select names from the suggestion dropdown for mentions.
sub.location: Within the Mention Suggestion Selection feature.
user_interactions: Selects suggestion with arrow keys and enter.

sub.name: Command Highlight
sub.description: Visual highlight for recognized commands as they are typed in the Shortcut Commands area.
sub.location: Within the Text Input Area.
user_interactions: Highlight engages as command is typed.

sub.name: Formatting Toolbar
sub.description: A toolbar that provides text formatting options such as bold, italics, and lists.
sub.location: Above or around the Text Input Area.
user_interactions: Formats selected text on option selection.
Multiple formatting options can be applied.

sub.name: Text Entry Field
sub.description: The area where users input their text messages directly.
sub.location: Within the Text Input Area of the Message Input Box.
user_interactions: Text is entered as the user types.
Message is sent on pressing Enter.

sub.name: Emoji Picker Interface
sub.description: Graphical interface enabling users to browse and select emojis.
sub.location: Accessed from the Emoji Picker, typically adjacent to the Text Input Area.
user_interactions: Emoji options are browsed by user.
Emoji is inserted into the message on click.

sub.name: File Integration Module
sub.description: Backend interface ensuring smooth integration of uploaded files into messages.
sub.location: Operates behind the File Upload Button.
user_interactions: Files are uploaded and ready for attachment.

sub.name: Formatting Options Interface
sub.description: User interface allowing selection and combination of formatting options.
sub.location: Connected to the Format Toggle Button and Formatting Toolbar.
user_interactions: Multiple formats are applied as selected.

sub.name: Send Action Confirmation
sub.description: Displays a confirmation message or icon once a message has been sent.
sub.location: Near or within the Send Button area.
user_interactions: Triggered when the Send Button is pressed.

sub.name: Mention Selection Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown that appears displaying possible usernames or channels as a mention is initiated.
sub.location: Below the text cursor during use of the Mentions Autocomplete.

sub.name: Send Button
sub.description: Button used to send the composed message to the current conversation.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Text Input Area.

sub.name: Mentions Autocomplete
sub.description: Feature that suggests users or channels to mention as the user types an '@' symbol.
sub.location: Integrated dynamically within the Text Input Area.

sub.name: Shortcut Commands
sub.description: Allows users to execute Slack commands by typing '/' followed by the command name.
sub.location: Initiated within the Text Input Area.
user_interactions: List of available commands shows after typing '/'.

sub.name: Text Entry Display
sub.description: The user interface showing the message being typed for visibility.
sub.location: Inside the Text Entry Field within the Message Input Box.

sub.name: Emoji Selection Panel
sub.description: Panel within the Emoji Picker Interface displaying available emojis for selection.
sub.location: Part of the Emoji Picker Interface.

sub.name: File Selection Dialog
sub.description: Interface that lets users choose files from their system to attach to a message.
sub.location: Activated via the File Integration Module.
user_interactions: Files added to the message upload list.

sub.name: Formatting Action Buttons
sub.description: UI components allowing users to apply or remove formatting tags within the input field.
sub.location: Aligned along the Formatting Options Interface.
user_interactions: Formats text as button is clicked.
Removes format using the same button.

sub.name: Sent Message Confirmation
sub.description: Message or icon showing that a message has been successfully dispatched.
sub.location: Near the Send Action Confirmation component.

sub.name: Mention Autocomplete List
sub.description: Dropdown menu that populates with potential mentions as the user types.
sub.location: Below where the text cursor is placed in the message.
user_interactions: List updates as new characters are typed.

name: Chat Area
description: Displays all the conversation history of the currently selected channel or direct message. Includes messages, threads, and media shared.
location: Central section of the interface, displaying the active channel or conversation.

sub.name: Message Display Area
sub.description: The main section where messages sent within a channel or direct message are displayed, including text and media.
sub.location: Centrally located within the Chat Area parent component.

sub.name: Thread Viewer
sub.description: Interface for viewing and interacting with threads linked to specific messages.
sub.location: Pops out as a sidebar or overlay when a thread is accessed.
user_interactions: Opens thread view on message click.

sub.name: Message Content Section
sub.description: The section within the Message Display Area where individual message content is displayed including text, images, and files.
sub.location: Within the Message Display Area, appearing as user scrolls through messages.

sub.name: Thread Interaction Pane
sub.description: Detailed view where users can interact with threads, add new replies, or view existing responses.
sub.location: Accessible through the Thread Viewer as a slide-out pane.
user_interactions: Reply to thread using input box.
Like or react to thread messages.

sub.name: Message Bubble
sub.description: Encapsulated area for individual messages displayed within the Chat Area, showing text, sender, and time.
sub.location: Appears sequentially as part of the Message Content Section.

sub.name: Thread Interaction Panel
sub.description: Interface to engage specifically with message threads, allowing users to add replies or review message history.
sub.location: Activated as part of a thread interaction via the Thread Interaction Pane.
user_interactions: Add to thread on text input and send.

sub.name: Message Text Content
sub.description: Displays the text portion of each message, including styling and links.
sub.location: Inside each Message Bubble within the Message Content Section.

sub.name: Media Attachment Display
sub.description: Area within Message Bubbles showing attached images, files, or videos.
sub.location: Within the Message Bubble, alongside or below text content.

sub.name: Thread Reply Input
sub.description: Input box within the Thread Interaction Panel for adding replies to existing threads.
sub.location: At the bottom of the Thread Interaction Panel.

sub.name: Pinned Indicator Badge
sub.description: Badge icon representing pinned status on a message within the Highlight Feature for Pinned Items.
sub.location: Overlayed on the message title or corner within the Pinned Item Highlighter.
user_interactions: Click to view all pinned items.

sub.name: Reaction Pop-up Menu
sub.description: Pop-up menu that expands from the Reaction Icon Display, listing available emoji reactions.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Reaction Icon Display, overlaying message area.

sub.name: Bookmark Edit Overlay
sub.description: Overlay allowing modification or deletion of bookmarks within the Bookmark Configuration Panel.
sub.location: Part of the Bookmark Configuration Panel.

sub.name: Filter Application Tools
sub.description: Tools within the Advanced Search Toolbar assisting in filtering search results by category or date.
sub.location: Integrated into the Advanced Search Toolbar.

sub.name: Highlight Feature for Pinned Items
sub.description: Emphasizes pinned messages or items within the main chat for better visibility.
sub.location: Functional within the Pinned Item Highlighter.

sub.name: Reaction Icon Display
sub.description: Interactive element allowing users to add and view emoji reactions to messages.
sub.location: Visible when hovering over a message.

sub.name: Bookmark Configuration Panel
sub.description: Options panel allowing users to add, remove, or edit bookmarks.
sub.location: Integrated within the Bookmark Management Interface.

sub.name: Advanced Search Toolbar
sub.description: Toolbar facilitating advanced search queries and applying filters within the Search Modal Overlay.
sub.location: Part of the Search Modal Overlay interface.
user_interactions: Search by message type or user.

sub.name: Link Click Interaction
sub.description: Handles interactions when a user clicks on hyperlinks within message text.
sub.location: Embedded within each Message Text Content area.
user_interactions: Opens link in a new tab.

sub.name: Media Preview Overlay
sub.description: Provides a detailed view when users click on media attachments within a message.
sub.location: Activated from the Media Attachment Display.

sub.name: URL Preview Card
sub.description: Embedded preview that provides a snippet view of the URL content within the Message Text Content.
sub.location: Appears as part of the Message Text Content when a link is included.

sub.name: Media Viewer Modal
sub.description: Modal window offering a detailed view of media and providing tools for interaction like zooming or saving.
sub.location: Overlay element activated via the Media Preview Overlay.
user_interactions: Media enlarges or shrinks with zoom.

sub.name: Link Hover Preview
sub.description: Hover effect that provides a preview of the URL content within the Message Text Content.
sub.location: Triggers when hovering over URLs in the URL Preview Card.

sub.name: Media Interaction Tools
sub.description: Provides tools for interacting with media inside the Media Viewer Modal, including zoom and share.
sub.location: Accessible within the Media Viewer Modal.

sub.name: Reply Read Confirmation
sub.description: Notifies users that their thread reply has been read by another participant.
sub.location: Functions within the Thread Reply Indicator.

sub.name: Pin Dropdown Options
sub.description: Dropdown providing specific options to manage pinned items, appearing within the Pinning Options Dropdown.
sub.location: Located in the Pinning Options Dropdown.

sub.name: Tally Breakdown Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip providing details on individual reaction counts when users hover over the Reaction Tally Display.
sub.location: Part of the Reaction Tally Display component.

sub.name: Bookmark Content Editor
sub.description: Editor feature that allows in-depth changes to bookmark details and organization.
sub.location: Integrated within the Bookmark Detail Editor.

sub.name: Filter Category Chips
sub.description: Chips representing active filter categories in the search, part of Active Filter Display.
sub.location: Visible within the Active Filter Display section.

sub.name: Thread Reply Indicator
sub.description: Acknowledges receipt of a reply within a thread, showing successful delivery.
sub.location: Displayed in the Reply Submission Confirmation section.

sub.name: Pinning Options Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown for managing pinned items, allowing toggling or listing within the Pinned Item Interaction Overlay.
sub.location: Part of the Pinned Item Interaction Overlay.

sub.name: Reaction Tally Display
sub.description: Shows individual counts of each reaction type added to a message.
sub.location: Located adjacent to the Emoji Reaction Display Counter.

sub.name: Link Interaction Preview
sub.description: Interactive preview allowing users to see content snippet when hovering over a URL.
sub.location: Within the URL Preview Card of the Message Text Content.

sub.name: Interactive Media Tools
sub.description: Set of tools provided to interact with media, including zoom, rotate, or full-screen features.
sub.location: Embedded within the Media Interaction Tools area.

sub.name: Read Confirmation Notice
sub.description: Notification or visual cue indicating a reply has been read by thread participants.
sub.location: Appears near the Reply Read Confirmation within threads.
user_interactions: Alert displayed when reply is read.

sub.name: Pin Management Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown management tool for pinned items, providing options such as pinning, unpinning or reordering.
sub.location: Located within the Pin Dropdown Options section.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Stats
sub.description: Summary view of aggregated emoji reactions for individual messages, accessible via Reaction Tally Display.
sub.location: Associated with Reaction Tally Display, adjacent to messages.

sub.name: Bookmark Attribute Editor
sub.description: Toolset within Bookmark Content Editor enabling modification of individual bookmark attributes like title, URL, and tags.
sub.location: Available within the Bookmark Content Editor.

sub.name: Filter Chip Controls
sub.description: UI elements for controlling active search filters represented as chips, part of Filter Category Chips.
sub.location: Exists within Filter Category Chips.

sub.name: Bookmark Detail Editor
sub.description: Editor allowing users to modify bookmark details, including name and URL.
sub.location: Within the Bookmark Edit Controls.

sub.name: Active Filter Display
sub.description: Visual representation of currently active filters in search, shown in the Search Filter Chip.
sub.location: Part of the Filter Application Tools.

sub.name: Reply Submission Confirmation
sub.description: Feedback mechanism confirming message delivery after user adds a reply in the Thread Reply Input.
sub.location: Operational within the Thread Reply Input.

sub.name: Pinned Item Interaction Overlay
sub.description: Overlay facilitating interactions with pinned items, allowing unpinning or direct navigation.
sub.location: Linked to the Pinned Indicator Badge.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Display Counter
sub.description: Counter showing the total number of reactions each message has received.
sub.location: Next to the Reaction Icon Display within the Reaction Pop-up Menu.

sub.name: Bookmark Edit Controls
sub.description: Controls for editing bookmark details within the Bookmark Edit Overlay.
sub.location: Part of the Bookmark Edit Overlay.
user_interactions: Edit fields for title or notes.

sub.name: Search Filter Chip
sub.description: Interactive elements representing active filters within the Filter Application Tools.
sub.location: Appears in the Advanced Search Toolbar.

sub.name: Pinned Item Highlighter
sub.description: Highlights pinned items for easy visibility within the Pinned Items Panel.
sub.location: Within the Pinned Items Panel, visually distinguishing highlighted items.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Selection
sub.description: Provides tooltips and selection options for emoji reactions when hovering over messages.
sub.location: Part of the Emoji Reaction Toolbar.

sub.name: Bookmark Management Interface
sub.description: Allows users to manage bookmarks from the Bookmark Sidebar, including adding, removing, or organizing bookmarks.
sub.location: Accessed within the Bookmark Sidebar.

sub.name: URL Content Tooltip
sub.description: Tooltip showing a brief description or image of a linked URL when hovered over.
sub.location: Above or beside the link in the Message Text Content.

sub.name: Media Zoom Tool
sub.description: Tool within the Interactive Media Tools that allows users to zoom into media for a closer view.
sub.location: Within the Interactive Media Tools of the Media Viewer Modal.
user_interactions: Click or slide to zoom media.

sub.name: Read Receipt Indicator
sub.description: Icon or text showing that a participant in the thread has read the message.
sub.location: Displayed within the Read Confirmation Notice.

sub.name: Pin Action Menu
sub.description: Menu providing action buttons for managing pin status, accessible from Pin Management Dropdown.
sub.location: Located within the Pin Management Dropdown.

sub.name: Reaction Distribution Tooltip
sub.description: Shows the distribution of reactions when users hover over the Emoji Reaction Stats.
sub.location: Appears near the Reaction Stats section.

sub.name: Bookmark Field Editor
sub.description: Input fields enabling changes to bookmark properties like name or tag.
sub.location: Part of the Bookmark Attribute Editor.

sub.name: Filter Management Chips
sub.description: Chips representing active filters with management capabilities, embedded in the Filter Chip Controls.
sub.location: Within the Filter Chip Controls section.

sub.name: Search Modal Overlay
sub.description: Full screen or modal overlay facilitating detailed searches within the chat.
sub.location: Part of the Search Interface, displaying search results.

sub.name: URL Summary Card
sub.description: Card displayed when a URL is included in a message, showing a brief preview of the link content.
sub.location: Embedded within the Message Text Content area.

sub.name: Full Media Viewer
sub.description: Provides an interface for full viewing of media with options like full-screen and downloadable buttons.
sub.location: Accessible through the Interactive Media Tools section.
user_interactions: Switches media to full-screen on click.

sub.name: Reply Read Notification
sub.description: Notification that informs users when their reply has been read in threads.
sub.location: Located in the Read Confirmation Notice section.

sub.name: Pin Options Menu
sub.description: Menu to manage pinned items, offering controls like pinning or unpinning and item organization.
sub.location: Exists within the Pin Action Menu.
user_interactions: Reorder or unpin from menu list.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Breakdown Tooltip
sub.description: Detailed breakdown tooltip providing specifics on who reacted and what emoji reaction was used.
sub.location: Related to the Reaction Distribution Tooltip.
user_interactions: Tooltip with details shows on hover.

sub.name: Bookmark Attribute Field
sub.description: Fields for editing the attributes of bookmarks, such as name or URL.
sub.location: Part of the Bookmark Field Editor.
user_interactions: Field changes are saved on confirmation.

sub.name: Search Filter Chip Management
sub.description: Management tools for handling search filter chips, facilitating operations like filter change or removal.
sub.location: Within Filter Management Chips.
user_interactions: Activate or deactivate filters via chips.

sub.name: Pinned Items Panel
sub.description: Displays messages or items that have been pinned for quick access.
sub.location: Accessed through a toggle within the Chat Area.
user_interactions: Navigates to the original message on click.

sub.name: Emoji Reaction Toolbar
sub.description: Toolbar allowing users to add emoji reactions to messages for a quick response.
sub.location: Adjacent to each message within the Chat Area.

sub.name: Bookmark Sidebar
sub.description: Sidebar showing all bookmarks created by the user for quick reference.
sub.location: Located alongside the main Chat Area on user command.

sub.name: Search Interface
sub.description: Interface to search for messages, files, or users within the Chat Area.
sub.location: Accessible from a search bar in the Chat Area.

sub.name: Snippet View Thumbnail
sub.description: Thumbnail view that gives a visual snippet of the URL content when hovered over a link.
sub.location: Part of the URL Content Tooltip within the URL Summary Card.

sub.name: Zoom Interaction Buttons
sub.description: Buttons enabling users to zoom in and out within the Full Media Viewer.
sub.location: Within the Full Media Viewer interface.

sub.name: Notification Display Element
sub.description: Element indicating read statuses across conversation replies and threads.
sub.location: Displayed in the Reply Read Notification section.

sub.name: Pin Interactions Manager
sub.description: Manager allowing users to pin or unpin messages and manage their order visually.
sub.location: Accessible within the Pin Options Menu.
user_interactions: Messages reordered by drag and drop.

sub.name: Reaction Summary Indicator
sub.description: Indicator providing a summary count of how many and what type of emoji reactions a message has received.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Emoji Reaction Breakdown Tooltip.

sub.name: Bookmark Edit Field
sub.description: Fields enabling users to add or adjust information related to their bookmarks.
sub.location: Located within the Bookmark Attribute Field.

sub.name: Filter Operation Chips
sub.description: Chips allowing active management of search filters, handling operations like activation, deactivation, or deletion.
sub.location: Related to the Search Filter Chip Management section.

name: Threads Panel
description: A component showing all active threads started in a channel, offering users a focused view of specific discussions separate from the main chat flow.
location: Generally appears on the right side of the chat area when a message thread is opened.

sub.name: Thread List
sub.description: Displays a list of all active threads that the user is involved in, sorted by recent activity.
sub.location: Left section of the Threads Panel parent component.
user_interactions: Unreads are marked as read on thread open.

sub.name: Thread List Entry
sub.description: Individual entry in the thread list representing each active thread with summary details.
sub.location: Within the Thread List section.

sub.name: Thread Preview Tile
sub.description: Compact overview of each thread in the list, showing recent interactions and activity summary.
sub.location: Within the Thread List Entry of Thread List.

sub.name: Thread Content Display
sub.description: Extended view of all replies and messages within a selected thread.
sub.location: Main area of Thread Detail View.
user_interactions: Add new reply input at bottom.

sub.name: Thread Summary Card
sub.description: Card displaying a brief summary of a thread, including the initial message and key details.
sub.location: Within the Thread Preview Tile.
user_interactions: Shows hover actions for quick info.

sub.name: Thread Message Area
sub.description: Area displaying the full conversation of replies within a thread.
sub.location: Main content section of Thread Content Display.

sub.name: Thread Summary Preview
sub.description: Provides a brief snapshot of the activity within a thread, showcasing the latest message and participant interactions.
sub.location: Displayed as part of each Thread Summary Card.

sub.name: Thread Messages Display
sub.description: Full display of all messages within a thread, allowing interaction with each through reactions or replies.
sub.location: Occupies the central area of the Thread Message Area.

sub.name: Thread Overview Card
sub.description: Visual representation summarizing each thread's core content and interactions.
sub.location: Placed in the Thread Summary Preview section.
user_interactions: Click to expand full thread details.

sub.name: Detailed Thread Message Viewer
sub.description: Shows entire message history and facilitates interactions through direct replies and emoji reactions.
sub.location: Occupies most of the Thread Messages Display.

sub.name: Thread Card Summary
sub.description: Provides a compact overview of the thread, summarizing recent posts and interactions.
sub.location: Positioned within the Thread Overview Card component.

sub.name: Full Thread Display
sub.description: Displays entire message flow within a thread for deeper engagement and reaction.
sub.location: Within the Detailed Thread Message Viewer.

sub.name: Thread Preview Details
sub.description: Shows detailed elements like participant names, timestamps, and message previews.
sub.location: Within the Thread Card Summary section.

sub.name: Thread Card Interactions
sub.description: Interactive elements within the Thread Card Summary allowing quick actions like marking as read or muting.
sub.location: Within the Thread Card Preview Details.

sub.name: Full Message History
sub.description: Displays the complete series of interactions and posts within a selected thread, providing detailed view for engagement.
sub.location: Central area within Full Conversation View.
user_interactions: React or reply directly to messages.

sub.name: Reply Box Component
sub.description: Component for entering and submitting replies back into the thread.
sub.location: Positioned in the Thread Reply Interface.

sub.name: Full Conversation View
sub.description: Presents the complete thread conversation with options to interact with each message.
sub.location: Central in Full Thread Display.

sub.name: Thread Card Hover Actions
sub.description: Interactive options revealed when hovering over a thread card, allowing actions like pinning or sharing.
sub.location: Within the Thread Card Interactions area.

sub.name: Conversation Scroll Area
sub.description: Scrollable area displaying the sequence of messages within a thread, facilitating navigation.
sub.location: Core part of Full Message History.

sub.name: Reply Input Field
sub.description: Text field for typing and sending replies to a thread.
sub.location: Contained within the Reply Box Component.

sub.name: Thread Reply Interface
sub.description: Allows users to input and submit replies to a thread.
sub.location: Part of Participation Controls.

sub.name: Participation Controls
sub.description: Facilitates thread interaction by allowing message replies and providing reaction options.
sub.location: Contained in the Engagement Controls area.

sub.name: Engagement Controls
sub.description: Provides interface for adding new replies and reactions, as well as managing notifications.
sub.location: Within the Reply and Reaction Tools area.

sub.name: Reply and Reaction Tools
sub.description: Tools provided for engaging with threads, including the reply box and emoji picker.
sub.location: Within the Thread Engagement Tools area.
user_interactions: Access reply box for new messages.

sub.name: Thread Engagement Tools
sub.description: Tools within Thread Interaction Controls providing reply options and additional settings.
sub.location: Part of the Thread Interaction Controls.

sub.name: Thread Interaction Controls
sub.description: Buttons and options for replying to, reacting to, and managing thread notifications.
sub.location: Within the Thread Actions section.

sub.name: Thread Detail View
sub.description: Detailed view of a selected thread showing full message content and interactions.
sub.location: Occupies the main area of the Selected Thread Viewer.
user_interactions: Replies are added at the bottom.

sub.name: Thread Card Action Icons
sub.description: Set of icons providing quick actions for threads such as muting notifications or marking the thread as important.
sub.location: Visible in the Thread Card Hover Actions.

sub.name: Message Interaction Layer
sub.description: Layer enabling users to interact with individual messages through reactions, bookmarks, or sharing.
sub.location: Overlay within the Full Message History.
user_interactions: React or share with quick actions.

sub.name: Reply Text Entry
sub.description: Text area for entering replies to be posted into a thread.
sub.location: Part of the Reply Input Field.

sub.name: Thread Actions
sub.description: Set of actions available for threads such as reacting, replying, and managing notifications.
sub.location: Positioned within the Thread Action Toolbar.

sub.name: Scroll Navigation
sub.description: Component facilitating vertical movement through threads and thread messages.
sub.location: On the edge of both Thread List and Selected Thread Viewer.

sub.name: Unread Notification Badge
sub.description: Badge indicating the presence of unread messages in threads.
sub.location: Attached to entries in the Thread List.

sub.name: Selected Thread Viewer
sub.description: Displays the detailed view of a selected thread, including all replies and interactions within that thread.
sub.location: Main section of the Threads Panel parent component.
user_interactions: Replies to the thread are added upon submission.
Reactions can be added to messages within the thread.

sub.name: Quick Action Buttons
sub.description: Buttons allowing for immediate actions such as pinning, sharing, or muting the thread.
sub.location: Visible within the Thread Card Action Icons.

sub.name: Message Interaction Options
sub.description: Options for interacting with messages, including selection of replies, reactions, and other functionalities.
sub.location: Overlay from the Message Interaction Layer.

sub.name: Text Input Mechanism
sub.description: Mechanism enabling users to input and send text replies within threads.
sub.location: Embedded in the Reply Text Entry field.
user_interactions: Send with enter or send button.

sub.name: Thread Action Toolbar
sub.description: Provides options such as adding a reaction, replying to the thread, and managing notifications for the thread.
sub.location: Top section within the Selected Thread Viewer.
user_interactions: Reaction menu opens on button click.
Notification settings open on icon click.

sub.name: Action Shortcut Buttons
sub.description: Buttons providing shortcuts for common thread actions, like saving or exporting a thread.
sub.location: Part of the Quick Action Buttons component.

sub.name: Message Reply Options
sub.description: Options for replying to messages, including direct reply or quoting previous messages.
sub.location: Within the Message Interaction Options layer.

sub.name: Reply Input Box
sub.description: Interface for the input and submission of thread replies directly.
sub.location: Located within the Text Input Mechanism.

sub.name: Scroll Bar
sub.description: Allows the user to navigate through the thread list or the messages within a selected thread.
sub.location: Right side of both the Thread List and Selected Thread Viewer sections.

sub.name: Notification Badge
sub.description: Displays the count of unread messages across all threads the user follows.
sub.location: Overlay on the Thread List section.

name: File Sharing Overlay
description: An interface to allow users to upload and share files with others in a channel or direct message. Users can attach documents, images, and other files.
location: Can be accessed from the message input box or a dedicated button within the chat area.

sub.name: File Upload Interface
sub.description: The main interface for selecting and uploading files to be shared in a channel or message.
sub.location: Central area of the File Sharing Overlay.
user_interactions: Open file selection dialog on click.

sub.name: File Input Dialog
sub.description: Dialog offering interface for selecting files from the local system to upload and share.
sub.location: Part of the File Upload Interface component.

sub.name: File Attribute Details
sub.description: Displays detailed file attributes like size and type, enabling renaming and removal.
sub.location: Within the File Details Display section.

sub.name: Upload Action Buttons
sub.description: Buttons for executing or cancelling file uploads, controlling the session flow.
sub.location: Contained within Upload Control Buttons area.
user_interactions: Confirm or cancel uploads with a button.

sub.name: Recipient Selector
sub.description: Interface allowing selection of multiple recipients or channels for file sharing.
sub.location: Housed within the Recipient Selection Panel area.

sub.name: File Selection Interface
sub.description: Main interface for choosing files, either by browsing directories or drag-and-drop mechanisms.
sub.location: Central portion within the File Input Dialog.
user_interactions: Select files from system to upload.

sub.name: File Edit Feature
sub.description: Allows users to modify file attributes such as name or choose to remove files.
sub.location: Located under File Attribute Details area.
user_interactions: Remove file from list on command.

sub.name: Control Menu Options
sub.description: Menu offering commands like 'Upload All' or 'Cancel Uploads' for better task management.
sub.location: Accessible within the Upload Action Buttons.
user_interactions: Execute action by selecting an option.

sub.name: Recipient Filter Tool
sub.description: Tool for filtering and selecting recipients based on criteria like recent or favorite contacts.
sub.location: Part of the Recipient Selector panel.
user_interactions: Select to add to recipient list.

sub.name: Progress Tracking Visualization
sub.description: Graphical interface displaying upload status and metrics including speed, and estimated time left.
sub.location: Positioned within Upload Progress Tracker section.

sub.name: File Navigator
sub.description: Interface allowing users to browse files and directories on their local system for selecting files to upload.
sub.location: Core part of the File Selection Interface.

sub.name: File Modification Options
sub.description: Allows users to perform actions like renaming or removing files from the upload list.
sub.location: Part of the File Edit Feature section.

sub.name: Session Control Commands
sub.description: Commands for managing the upload session, such as pausing or canceling file uploads.
sub.location: Contained in the Control Menu Options.

sub.name: Contact Selection Filter
sub.description: Filter allowing users to narrow down recipients through search and predefined criteria.
sub.location: Nested in the Recipient Filter Tool.
user_interactions: Use filter to refine recipient list.

sub.name: Progress Visualization Bars
sub.description: Bars showing visual progress indicators and metrics of file upload processes.
sub.location: Displayed in the Progress Tracking Visualization.

sub.name: File Transfer Zone
sub.description: Zone enabling drag-and-drop action for quicker file selection for upload.
sub.location: Overlaying the primary interface, accessible from Drag and Drop Zone.
user_interactions: Drop files here to add them.

sub.name: Upload Progress Tracker
sub.description: Tracker displaying real-time progression and status of file uploads.
sub.location: Jointly located with File Details Display or Upload Control Buttons.

sub.name: File Details Display
sub.description: Section showing details about files to be uploaded, such as file name, size, and type.
sub.location: Below the File Upload Interface.

sub.name: Upload Control Buttons
sub.description: Buttons for controlling uploads, such as confirming uploads or cancelling.
sub.location: At the bottom of the File Sharing Overlay.

sub.name: Recipient Selection Panel
sub.description: Panel allowing users to choose recipients for shared files, including channels or direct messages.
sub.location: Side or bottom of the overlay.

sub.name: Navigator Panel
sub.description: Panel allowing users to explore local directories and select files for sharing.
sub.location: Part of the File Navigator in the File Selection Interface.

sub.name: Attribute Adjustment Options
sub.description: Options enabling users to rename or alter the properties of files in the upload list.
sub.location: Located within File Modification Options.

sub.name: Session Command Menu
sub.description: Menu used for executing commands to control upload sessions, pause, cancel, etc.
sub.location: Situated in the Session Control Commands.
user_interactions: Select command to initiate session control.

sub.name: Filter Criteria Tool
sub.description: Tool facilitating filtering of recipients based on selectable criteria.
sub.location: Located within the Contact Selection Filter.

sub.name: Upload Progress Display
sub.description: Displays progress of file uploads with visual indicators and data such as time and speed.
sub.location: Within Progress Visualization Bars.
user_interactions: Live update of upload speed and time.

sub.name: Drag and Drop Zone
sub.description: Area for drag-and-dropping files to initiate upload actions quickly.
sub.location: Overlaid on the File Upload Interface.
user_interactions: Drop files to add to upload list.

sub.name: Upload Status Indicator
