sub.description: Indicator showing the status of file uploads, including progress and completion.
sub.location: Within the File Details Display or Upload Control Buttons area.

name: Search Bar
description: Enables users to search across messages, files, and users to quickly find relevant information. Often includes filters to narrow search queries.
location: Located at the top of the main interface, typically integrated into the header section.

sub.name: Search Input Field
sub.description: Primary field where users can enter their search queries.
sub.location: Central component of the Search Bar.
user_interactions: Accepts text input as search queries.

sub.name: Search Filter Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown providing filter options to refine search results.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Search Input Field.
user_interactions: Expands to show filters on click.

sub.name: Text Input Area
sub.description: Area where the user can type their search query keywords.
sub.location: Within the Search Input Field on the Search Bar.
user_interactions: Search initiates on enter key press.

sub.name: Filter Options Selector
sub.description: List of selectable filters that allow users to narrow their search results.
sub.location: Inside the Search Filter Dropdown next to the input field.
user_interactions: Select filters to apply to search.

sub.name: Keyword Input Segment
sub.description: Section dedicated to capturing user's search keywords for query execution.
sub.location: Core area within the Text Input Area.

sub.name: Filtering Options Dialog
sub.description: Dialog listing available filters to refine search results.
sub.location: Within the Filter Options Selector panel.

sub.name: Suggestion Generation Layer
sub.description: Layer generating real-time search suggestions based on input data.
sub.location: Populates under the Autocomplete Dropdown.

sub.name: Search Trigger Icon
sub.description: Icon functioning as a button to initiate the search process.
sub.location: Occupies edge of Execution Button.

sub.name: Input Clear Button
sub.description: Button associated with clearing the input field and any search parameters.
sub.location: Positioned in Clear Search Icon.

sub.name: Autocomplete Dropdown
sub.description: Dropdown displaying predictive text suggestions as the user types.
sub.location: Dropdown below the text input area.
user_interactions: Updates with suggestions as text is entered.
Users can click on a suggestion to auto-fill.

sub.name: Execution Button
sub.description: Icon/button used to initiate the search process with a click.
sub.location: Located at the far end of the Search Bar.

sub.name: Clear Search Icon
sub.description: Icon to clear the current search input and filters.
sub.location: Insight of the Search Input Area.

sub.name: Search Suggestions List
sub.description: Displays suggested searches based on user input.
sub.location: Below the Search Input Field as a dropdown.
user_interactions: Select suggestion with mouse or keys.

sub.name: Search Icon Button
sub.description: Button that executes the search operation when clicked.
sub.location: Right end of the Search Bar.

sub.name: Search Reset Button
sub.description: Button for clearing the current search query and resetting the search bar.
sub.location: Inside the Search Input Field.

name: User Presence Indicator
description: Displays the online/offline status of users. Often shown as a small colored circle next to user icons or names.
location: Present next to user avatars in the direct messages list and user profiles.

sub.name: Status Icon
sub.description: Displays a color-coded status icon indicating whether a user is online or offline.
sub.location: Next to user avatars or names in the User Presence Indicator.
user_interactions: Changes color based on user status.

sub.name: Status Tooltip
sub.description: Displays additional presence information such as 'Do not disturb' status on hover.
sub.location: Displayed near the Status Icon.
user_interactions: Appears when hovering over the status icon.

sub.name: User Interaction Icon
sub.description: An icon signifying if the user is actively interacting or away.
sub.location: Overlay within the Status Icon area.

sub.name: Presence Notification
sub.description: Provides subtle alerts or notifications when user's presence changes.
sub.location: Associated function within the User Presence Indicator.

name: User Status Update Overlay
description: Interface for users to set or change their status, including away or busy notes and emoji status updates.
location: Accessed by clicking on the user's profile picture or status icon, typically in the header or sidebar.

sub.name: Status Input Field
sub.description: Field for users to type their status message or update.
sub.location: Central area within the User Status Update Overlay.

sub.name: Status Emoji Selector
sub.description: Allows users to add an emoji to their status message.
sub.location: Adjacent to the Status Input Field.

sub.name: Predefined Status Options
sub.description: List of common status options users can quickly select from.
sub.location: Below the Status Input Field for quick access.

sub.name: Status Visibility Toggle
sub.description: Toggle allowing users to decide who can see their status.
sub.location: Located in the lower section of the overlay.

sub.name: Status Duration Timer
sub.description: Set the duration or expiration for the status update.
sub.location: Found beside or below the Status Input Field.

name: Emoji Reaction Picker
description: A component providing a selection of emojis for users to react to messages, helping express sentiments or acknowledge messages without typing.
location: Activated by clicking an emoji icon next to any message in the chat area.

sub.name: Emoji Category Tabs
sub.description: Tabs for navigating through different categories of emojis.
sub.location: Top section of the Emoji Reaction Picker.
user_interactions: Switch emoji category on tab click.

sub.name: Emoji Search Field
sub.description: Field for users to type and search specific emojis.
sub.location: Above the emoji selection grid inside the picker.
user_interactions: Filters emoji list based on input.

sub.name: Emoji Grid Display
sub.description: Displays emojis available for selection within the current category.
sub.location: Central part of the Emoji Reaction Picker.
user_interactions: Click on an emoji to select.

sub.name: Emoji Category Selector
sub.description: Tabs enabling users to navigate through different emoji categories.
sub.location: Top section of the Emoji Reaction Picker.

sub.name: Emoji Search Bar
sub.description: Input field for searching emojis by name or keyword.
sub.location: Located at the top of the Emoji Reaction Picker beneath the category tabs.

sub.name: Emoji Display Grid
sub.description: Grid showing all available emojis within the selected category.
sub.location: Main area of the Emoji Reaction Picker.

sub.name: Frequently Used Emojis
sub.description: Section listing the emojis most frequently used by the user.
sub.location: Displayed initially before all other categories.

sub.name: Selected Emoji Highlight
sub.description: Highlight indicating the emoji selected for a reaction.
sub.location: Overlay appearing on the emoji grid item.

sub.name: Recently Used Emojis
sub.description: Section displaying emojis recently used by the user.
sub.location: Before other emoji categories in the picker.

sub.name: Emoji Selection Indicator
sub.description: Visual cue indicating the selected emoji for reaction.
sub.location: Overlay that appears on the selected emoji.

name: Preferences Overlay
description: A detailed settings interface allowing users to configure preferences like notification settings, themes, and account details.
location: Opened via a settings or profile menu option available in the header or user profile section.

sub.name: Notification Settings
sub.description: Section allowing users to customize notification preferences.
sub.location: Upper section of the Preferences Overlay.
user_interactions: Choose types of notifications (e.g., mention, direct message).

sub.name: Theme Selection
sub.description: Options for users to select interface themes such as light or dark mode.
sub.location: Middle section of the Preferences Overlay.

sub.name: Account Management
sub.description: Provides options for users to view and manage their account details.
sub.location: Lower section of the Preferences Overlay.

sub.name: Language Preferences
sub.description: Settings to select the preferred language for the interface.
sub.location: Bottom section of the Preferences Overlay.

sub.name: Privacy Controls
sub.description: Settings for adjusting privacy and data-sharing options.
sub.location: Lower section of the Preferences Overlay, adjacent to Account Management.

name: New Channel/Group Creation Overlay
description: Interface for creating new channels, inviting members, and setting initial permissions and details for a new chat group.
location: Accessed through a dedicated button or option within the channel list or workspace navigation area.
